html: <bob-panel id='content'>
<tooldrawer-cluster>

<tooldrawer-field-content-layout group-label='' type='choice-tiles' size='md' path='type' label='Layout' value='{{type}}' options='[{"label":"Grid","value":"grid","icon":"circle.grid.2x2"},{"label":"Carousel","value":"carousel","icon":"ellipsis"}]' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-field-header-settings group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='header.enabled' label='Show header' />
<tooldrawer-field-header-settings group-label='' type='dropdown-edit' size='lg' path='header.title' label='Title' placeholder='Add title text' show-if="header.enabled == true" />
<tooldrawer-field-header-settings group-label='' type='dropdown-edit' size='md' path='header.textHtml' label='Subtitle' placeholder='Add subtitle text' show-if="header.enabled == true" />

<tooldrawer-field-header-settings group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='header.alignment' label='Alignment' value='{{header.alignment}}' options='[{"label":"Left","value":"left"},{"label":"Center","value":"center"},{"label":"Right","value":"right"}]' show-if="header.enabled == true" />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-field-cta-settings group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='cta.enabled' label='Show CTA button' />
<tooldrawer-field-cta-settings group-label='' type='textfield' size='md' path='cta.label' label='CTA label' show-if="cta.enabled == true" />
<tooldrawer-field-cta-settings group-label='' type='textfield' size='lg' path='cta.href' label='CTA link' placeholder='https://example.com' show-if="cta.enabled == true" />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster>

<tooldrawer-field-content-logos group-label='' class='diet-object-manager' type='object-manager' path='strips' add-label='Add strip' reorder-label='Manage strips' reorder-title='Manage strips' label-path='logos.0.name' index-token='__STRIP__' default-item='{"logos":[{"name":"New logo","asset":{"name":"","source":"user"},"logoFill":"transparent","href":"","targetBlank":false,"nofollow":false,"alt":"","title":"","caption":""}]}' template='<tooldrawer-field type="repeater" size="md" path="strips.__STRIP__.logos" label="Logos" add-label="Add logo" reorder-label="Manage logos" reorder-title="Manage logos" add-open="bulk-edit" default-item="{&quot;name&quot;:&quot;New logo&quot;,&quot;asset&quot;:{&quot;name&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;source&quot;:&quot;user&quot;},&quot;logoFill&quot;:&quot;transparent&quot;,&quot;href&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;targetBlank&quot;:false,&quot;nofollow&quot;:false,&quot;alt&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" template="&lt;tooldrawer-field type=&quot;dropdown-upload&quot; size=&quot;md&quot; path=&quot;strips.__STRIP__.logos.__INDEX__.logoFill&quot; meta-path=&quot;strips.__STRIP__.logos.__INDEX__.asset&quot; label=&quot;Logo&quot; placeholder=&quot;Upload logo&quot; accept=&quot;image/*,.svg&quot; template=&quot;&amp;lt;tooldrawer-field type=&amp;quot;textfield&amp;quot; size=&amp;quot;sm&amp;quot; path=&amp;quot;strips.__STRIP__.logos.__INDEX__.name&amp;quot; label=&amp;quot;Name&amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;quot;Logo name&amp;quot; /&amp;gt;&amp;lt;tooldrawer-field type=&amp;quot;textfield&amp;quot; size=&amp;quot;sm&amp;quot; path=&amp;quot;strips.__STRIP__.logos.__INDEX__.caption&amp;quot; label=&amp;quot;Caption&amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;quot;Optional caption&amp;quot; /&amp;gt;&quot; /&gt;" />' />

<tooldrawer-field-content-logos group-label='' type='bulk-edit' size='md' path='strips' row-path='logos' label='Logo details...' title='Logo details' columns='[{"label":"Logo","path":"logoFill","metaPath":"asset","autoNamePath":"name","control":"upload","placeholder":"Upload logo","accept":"image/*,.svg"},{"label":"Name","path":"name","control":"text"},{"label":"Caption","path":"caption","control":"text"},{"label":"URL","path":"href","control":"text","placeholder":"https://example.com","flag":"links.enabled"},{"label":"Open in new tab","path":"targetBlank","control":"checkbox","flag":"links.enabled"},{"label":"Nofollow","path":"nofollow","control":"checkbox","flag":"links.enabled"},{"label":"Alt text","path":"alt","control":"text","flag":"media.meta.enabled"},{"label":"Title (tooltip)","path":"title","control":"text","flag":"media.meta.enabled"}]' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster show-if="type == 'grid'">
<tooldrawer-field-grid-settings group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='spacing.rowGap' label='Row gap (px)' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster show-if="type == 'carousel'">

<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='segmented' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.mode' label='Mode' options='[{"label":"Paged","value":"paged"},{"label":"Continuous","value":"continuous"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='segmented' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.step' label='Step' options='[{"label":"By logo","value":"logo"},{"label":"By page","value":"page"}]' show-if="typeConfig.carousel.mode == 'paged'" />
<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.showArrows' label='Show arrows' show-if="typeConfig.carousel.mode == 'paged'" />
<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.allowSwipe' label='Allow swipe/drag' show-if="typeConfig.carousel.mode == 'paged'" />
<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.autoplay' label='Autoplay' show-if="typeConfig.carousel.mode == 'paged'" />

<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.autoSlideDelayMs' label='Autoplay delay (ms)' show-if="typeConfig.carousel.mode == 'paged' && typeConfig.carousel.autoplay == true" />
<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.transitionMs' label='Transition (ms)' show-if="typeConfig.carousel.mode == 'paged'" />
<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.speed' label='Speed (px/sec)' show-if="typeConfig.carousel.mode == 'continuous'" />

<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.direction' label='Direction' value='{{typeConfig.carousel.direction}}' options='[{"label":"Left","value":"left"},{"label":"Right","value":"right"}]' show-if="typeConfig.carousel.mode == 'continuous'" />
<tooldrawer-field-carousel-settings group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='typeConfig.carousel.pauseOnHover' label='Pause on hover' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='layout'>
<tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-field-spacing-settings group-label='' type='slider' size='md' path='spacing.logoHeight' label='Logo size' min='40' max='400' />
<tooldrawer-field-spacing-settings group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='spacing.gap' label='Logo gap (px)' />
<tooldrawer-field-spacing-settings group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='spacing.stripGap' label='Strip gap (px)' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-field-spacing-mobile group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='spacing.mobileGap' label='Logo gap (mobile px)' />
<tooldrawer-field-spacing-mobile group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='spacing.mobileStripGap' label='Strip gap (mobile px)' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-field-layout-behavior group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.randomOrder' label='Randomize logo order' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='appearance'>
<tooldrawer-cluster>

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-logos group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.logoLook' label='Logo look' value='{{appearance.logoLook}}' options='[{"label":"Original","value":"original"},{"label":"Grayscale","value":"grayscale"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-appearance-logos group-label='' type='valuefield' size='md' path='appearance.logoOpacity' label='Logo opacity (0-1)' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-logos group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color,gradient,image' path='appearance.itemBackground' label='Logo tile background' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemBackground' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.itemBackground}}' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster>

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked' label='Link logo tile radius' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.linkItemRadius' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked}}' default='true' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radius' label='Logo tile radius' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemRadius' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radius}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == true" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusTL' label='Logo tile top-left radius' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemTopLeftRadius' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusTL}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusTR' label='Logo tile top-right radius' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemTopRightRadius' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusTR}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusBR' label='Logo tile bottom-right radius' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemBottomRightRadius' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusBR}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.radiusBL' label='Logo tile bottom-left radius' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemBottomLeftRadius' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.itemCard.radiusBL}}' show-if="appearance.itemCard.radiusLinked == false" options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"2xl"},{"label":"Medium","value":"4xl"},{"label":"Large","value":"6xl"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"10xl"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-border' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.border' label='Logo tile border' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemBorder' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.itemCard.border}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-item-card group-label='' type='dropdown-shadow' size='md' path='appearance.itemCard.shadow' label='Logo tile shadow' label-key='logoshowcase.labels.itemShadow' label-params='{"item":{"$t":"logoshowcase.item","count":1}}' value='{{appearance.itemCard.shadow}}' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-field-appearance-text group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color' path='appearance.titleColor' label='Title color' value='{{appearance.titleColor}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-appearance-text group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color' path='appearance.textColor' label='Text color' value='{{appearance.textColor}}' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster>

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-cta group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='cta.style' label='CTA style' value='{{cta.style}}' options='[{"label":"Filled","value":"filled"},{"label":"Outline","value":"outline"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field-appearance-cta group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color' path='appearance.ctaBackground' label='CTA background' value='{{appearance.ctaBackground}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-appearance-cta group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color' path='appearance.ctaTextColor' label='CTA text color' value='{{appearance.ctaTextColor}}' />

<tooldrawer-field-appearance-cta group-label='' type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.ctaRadius' label='CTA radius' placeholder='Choose radius' value='{{appearance.ctaRadius}}' options='[{"label":"None","value":"none"},{"label":"Small","value":"sm"},{"label":"Medium","value":"md"},{"label":"Large","value":"lg"},{"label":"X-Large","value":"xl"},{"label":"2XL","value":"2xl"}]' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color,gradient,image,video' path='stage.background' label='Background' value='{{stage.background}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance group-label='' type='dropdown-fill' size='md' fill-modes='color,gradient,image,video' path='pod.background' label='Pod background' value='{{pod.background}}' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='settings'>
<tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-field-settings-seo group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='seoGeo.enabled' label='Enable SEO/GEO optimization' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-cluster>
<tooldrawer-field-settings-behavior group-label='' type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.showBacklink' label='Show backlink' />
</tooldrawer-cluster>
</bob-panel>
